useCases.businessChallenge: Continental is using Google's data and AI technologies to develop automotive solutions that are safe, efficient, and user-focused. One of the initial outcomes of this partnership is the integration of Google Cloud's conversational AI technologies into Continental's Smart Cockpit HPC, an in-vehicle speech-command solution.
useCases.implementationBlueprint: Driver speaks command -> Conversational AI processes natural language -> Intent recognition identifies request -> Smart Cockpit HPC executes command -> Response delivered through vehicle interface

useCases.businessChallenge: General Motors' OnStar has been augmented with new AI features, including a virtual assistant powered by Google Cloud's conversational AI technologies that are better able to recognize the speaker's intent.
useCases.implementationBlueprint: Driver initiates OnStar request -> Virtual assistant captures speech -> AI analyzes intent and context -> Personalized response generated -> Service action executed or information provided

useCases.businessChallenge: Mercedes-Benz is providing conversational search and navigation in the new CLA series cars using Google Cloud's industry-tuned Automotive AI Agent.
useCases.implementationBlueprint: Driver speaks navigation query -> Automotive AI Agent processes request -> Search results filtered for driving context -> Navigation route calculated -> Turn-by-turn guidance provided

useCases.businessChallenge: Mercedes-Benz is infusing e-commerce capabilities into its online storefront with a gen AI-powered smart sales assistant.
useCases.implementationBlueprint: Customer visits online storefront -> Smart sales assistant engages visitor -> AI analyzes preferences and needs -> Personalized vehicle recommendations generated -> Guided configuration and purchase flow

useCases.businessChallenge: PODS worked with the advertising agency Tombras to create the "World's Smartest Billboard" using Gemini — a campaign on its trucks that could adapt to each neighborhood in New York City, changing in real-time based on data. It hit all 299 neighborhoods in just 29 hours, creating more than 6,000 unique headlines.
useCases.implementationBlueprint: Truck enters neighborhood -> Location data triggers content request -> Gemini analyzes neighborhood characteristics -> Unique headline generated -> Billboard display updated in real-time

useCases.businessChallenge: UPS Capital launched DeliveryDefense Address Confidence, which uses machine learning and UPS data to provide a confidence score for shippers to help them determine the likelihood of a successful delivery.
useCases.implementationBlueprint: Shipper submits delivery address -> ML model analyzes historical delivery data -> Confidence score calculated -> Risk assessment provided to shipper -> Delivery decision informed

useCases.businessChallenge: Volkswagen of America built a virtual assistant in the myVW app, where drivers can explore their owners' manuals and ask questions, such as, "How do I change a flat tire?" or "What does this digital cockpit indicator light mean?" Users can also use Gemini's multimodal capabilities to see helpful information and context on indicator lights simply by pointing their smartphone cameras at the dashboard.
useCases.implementationBlueprint: Driver opens myVW app -> Asks question or points camera at dashboard -> Gemini processes text/image input -> Relevant manual information retrieved -> Clear answer with visuals provided

useCases.businessChallenge: 704 Apps creates applications serving the last-mile transportation segment, connecting thousands of drivers and passengers every day. During trips, the audio content of conversations between car occupants is sent to Gemini, which measures the emotional "temperature." Specific words such as "robbery", "assault", "kidnapping", among others, can be classified as hostile by the tool, generating alerts to anticipate risky situations before they happen.
useCases.implementationBlueprint: Audio captured during trip -> Gemini analyzes conversation content -> Emotional temperature measured -> Hostile keywords detected -> Alert generated for risky situations

useCases.businessChallenge: Oxa, a developer of software for autonomous vehicles, uses Gemini for Google Workspace to build campaign templates for metrics reporting, write social posts in order to make marketing processes more efficient, create job descriptions, and proofread content across all teams, saving time and resources.
useCases.implementationBlueprint: Team creates content request -> Gemini generates campaign templates/social posts/job descriptions -> Content proofread by AI -> Review and approval -> Published across channels

useCases.businessChallenge: Rivian uses Google Workspace with Gemini to enhance communication and collaboration across tech and marketing teams, resulting in faster, higher quality work.
useCases.implementationBlueprint: Teams collaborate in Workspace -> Gemini assists with content creation -> Communication streamlined across departments -> Work quality improved -> Faster delivery achieved

useCases.businessChallenge: Toyota implemented an AI platform using Google Cloud's AI infrastructure to enable factory workers to develop and deploy machine learning models. This led to a reduction of over 10,000 man-hours per year and increased efficiency and productivity.
useCases.implementationBlueprint: Factory workers identify optimization opportunity -> AI platform enables ML model development -> Models deployed to production -> Processes automated -> 10,000+ man-hours saved annually

useCases.businessChallenge: Uber is using AI agents to help employees be more productive, save time, and be even more effective at work. For customer service representatives, the company launched new tools that summarize communications with users and can even surface context from previous interactions, so front-line staff can be more helpful and effective.
useCases.implementationBlueprint: Customer contacts support -> AI summarizes previous communications -> Context from past interactions surfaced -> Representative receives comprehensive view -> Faster, more effective resolution

useCases.businessChallenge: Uber also uses Google Workspace with Gemini to save time on repetitive tasks, free up developers for higher-value work, reduce their agency spending, and to enhance employee retention.
useCases.implementationBlueprint: Employees use Workspace with Gemini -> Repetitive tasks automated -> Developers focus on high-value work -> Agency spending reduced -> Employee satisfaction improved

useCases.businessChallenge: Renault Group's Ampere, an EV and software subsidiary created in 2023, is using an enterprise version of Gemini Code Assist, built for teams of developers and able to understand a company's code base, standards, and conventions.
useCases.implementationBlueprint: Developers write code -> Gemini Code Assist understands codebase context -> Code suggestions aligned with company standards -> Code quality maintained -> Development velocity increased

useCases.businessChallenge: BMW Group, in collaboration with Monkeyway, developed the AI solution SORDI.ai to optimize industrial planning processes and supply chains with gen AI. This involves scanning assets and using Vertex AI to create 3D models that act as digital twins that perform thousands of simulations to optimize distribution efficiency.
useCases.implementationBlueprint: Assets scanned -> Vertex AI creates 3D models -> Digital twins generated -> Thousands of simulations run -> Distribution efficiency optimized

useCases.businessChallenge: Dematic is using the multimodal features in Vertex AI and Gemini to build end-to-end fulfillment solutions for both ecommerce and omnichannel retailers.
useCases.implementationBlueprint: Retailer defines fulfillment needs -> Multimodal AI analyzes operations -> End-to-end solution designed -> Fulfillment processes optimized -> Omnichannel integration achieved

useCases.businessChallenge: Geotab, a global leader in telematics, uses BigQuery and Vertex AI to analyze billions of data points per day from over 4.6 million vehicles. This enables real-time insights for fleet optimization, driver safety, transportation decarbonization, and macro-scale transportation analytics to drive safer and more sustainable cities.
useCases.implementationBlueprint: Vehicles transmit telematics data -> BigQuery processes billions of data points -> Vertex AI generates insights -> Fleet optimization recommendations provided -> Safety and sustainability improved

useCases.businessChallenge: Kinaxis is building data-driven supply chain solutions to address logistics use cases including scenario modeling, planning, operations management, and automation.
useCases.implementationBlueprint: Supply chain data ingested -> Scenario modeling performed -> Planning optimized -> Operations automated -> End-to-end visibility achieved

useCases.businessChallenge: Nuro, an autonomous driving company, uses vector search in AlloyDB to enable their vehicles to accurately classify objects encountered on the road.
useCases.implementationBlueprint: Vehicle sensors detect objects -> Vector search queries AlloyDB -> Object classification performed -> Driving decisions informed -> Safe navigation executed

useCases.businessChallenge: Picterra, which calls itself a search engine for the physical world, adopted Google Kubernetes Engine to power its platform, providing the ability to quickly scale to meet the demands of geospatial AI workloads. With GKE, Picterra can model the terrain of entire countries quickly, even at ultra-high resolutions.
useCases.implementationBlueprint: Geospatial data ingested -> GKE scales to handle workload -> AI models terrain at ultra-high resolution -> Country-wide models generated -> Physical world searchable

useCases.businessChallenge: Prewave, a supply chain risk intelligence platform, utilizes Google Cloud's AI services to provide end-to-end risk monitoring and ESG risk detection for businesses. This enables companies to gain transparency deep into their supply chains, ensuring resilience, sustainability, and compliance.
useCases.implementationBlueprint: Supply chain data collected -> AI monitors for risks -> ESG issues detected -> Transparency provided -> Compliance and resilience ensured

useCases.businessChallenge: Accenture is transforming customer support at a major retailer by offering convenient self-service options through virtual assistants, enhancing the overall customer experience.
useCases.implementationBlueprint: Customer initiates support request -> Virtual assistant engages -> Self-service options provided -> Issue resolved automatically -> Customer experience enhanced

useCases.businessChallenge: Capgemini is using Google Cloud to build AI agents that help optimize the ecommerce experience by helping retailers accept customer orders through new revenue channels and accelerate the order-to-cash process for digital stores.
useCases.implementationBlueprint: Customer places order through new channel -> AI agent processes order -> Order-to-cash accelerated -> Revenue captured -> Digital store optimized

useCases.businessChallenge: Deloitte offers a "Care Finder" agent, built with Google Cloud, as part of its Agent Fleet. The agent helps care seekers find in-network providers — often in less than a minute — significantly faster than the average call time of five to eight minutes.
useCases.implementationBlueprint: Care seeker initiates search -> Care Finder agent processes request -> In-network providers identified -> Results delivered in under a minute -> Time saved vs traditional call

useCases.businessChallenge: Ferret.ai uses AI to offer insights about the backgrounds of people in a user's personal and professional network, providing a curated relationship intelligence and monitoring solution for its users — increasingly important services in a world of growing reputational risks.
useCases.implementationBlueprint: User connects network -> AI analyzes backgrounds -> Insights curated -> Reputational risks identified -> Relationship intelligence delivered

useCases.businessChallenge: Intuit, the makers of TurboTax, integrated Google Cloud's visual recognition platform, Doc AI, and Gemini models into Intuit's proprietary GenOS. This will expand the capabilities of Intuit's "done-for-you" autofill of tax returns across the ten most common U.S. tax forms (variations of the 1099 and 1040 forms), helping users save time and boosting accuracy.
useCases.implementationBlueprint: User uploads tax documents -> Doc AI extracts data visually -> Gemini processes forms -> Tax return autofilled -> Time saved and accuracy boosted

useCases.businessChallenge: Stax AI, which aims to revolutionize retirement planning with AI, uses MongoDB Atlas and Vertex AI to automate its manual processes and transform massive volumes of trust accounting data in minutes.
useCases.implementationBlueprint: Trust accounting data ingested -> Vertex AI processes massive volumes -> Manual processes automated -> Data transformed in minutes -> Retirement planning enhanced

useCases.businessChallenge: Sutherland, a leading digital transformation company, is focused on bringing together human expertise and AI, including boosting its client-facing teams by automatically surfacing suggested responses and automating insights in real time.
useCases.implementationBlueprint: Client interaction initiated -> AI surfaces suggested responses -> Insights automated in real time -> Human expertise enhanced -> Client experience improved

useCases.businessChallenge: Wagestream, a financial wellbeing platform for employee benefits, is using Gemini models to handle more than 80% of its internal customer inquiries, including questions about payment dates, balances, and more.
useCases.implementationBlueprint: Customer submits inquiry -> Gemini processes question -> Payment/balance info retrieved -> Response generated automatically -> 80% of inquiries handled

useCases.businessChallenge: WealthAPI, the leading provider of wealth management interfaces in Germany, uses Gemini and DataStax Astra DB to deliver next-gen financial insights in real time to millions of customers for personalized guidance at scale.
useCases.implementationBlueprint: Customer requests financial insight -> Gemini analyzes data -> Astra DB retrieves relevant info -> Personalized guidance generated -> Real-time insights delivered at scale

useCases.businessChallenge: Allegis Group, a global leader in talent solutions, partnered with TEKsystems to implement AI models to streamline its recruitment process, including automating tasks such as updating candidate profiles, generating job descriptions, and analyzing recruiter-candidate interactions. The implementation resulted in significant improvements in recruiter efficiency and a reduction in technical debt.
useCases.implementationBlueprint: Recruitment task initiated -> AI automates profile updates -> Job descriptions generated -> Interactions analyzed -> Recruiter efficiency improved

useCases.businessChallenge: BCG uses Google Cloud to provide a sales optimization tool that improves the effectiveness and impact of insurance advisors.
useCases.implementationBlueprint: Insurance advisor uses tool -> AI analyzes sales opportunities -> Optimization recommendations provided -> Advisor effectiveness improved -> Sales impact increased

useCases.businessChallenge: Cintas is using Vertex AI Search to develop an internal knowledge center for customer service and sales teams to easily find key information.
useCases.implementationBlueprint: Employee searches for information -> Vertex AI Search queries knowledge base -> Relevant results returned -> Key information found easily -> Service and sales improved

useCases.businessChallenge: Beyond is a technology consultancy that guides their clients through transformational journeys to unlock the potential of AI and cloud-based technology. Google Workspace with Gemini helps them reduce the time from project brief to project kickoff from months to weeks, and the time for first drafts of RFI responses from days to minutes.
useCases.implementationBlueprint: Project brief received -> Gemini accelerates planning -> Kickoff time reduced from months to weeks -> RFI drafts generated in minutes -> Client transformation accelerated

useCases.businessChallenge: Dun & Bradstreet, a business research and intelligence service, built an email-generation tool with Gemini that helps sellers create tailored, personalized communications to prospects and customers for its research services. The company also developed intelligent search capabilities to help users with complex queries like, "Find me all the companies in this area with a high ESG rating."
useCases.implementationBlueprint: Seller initiates communication -> Gemini generates personalized email -> Complex search query submitted -> Intelligent search finds matching companies -> Tailored outreach completed

useCases.businessChallenge: Cognizant used Vertex AI and Gemini to build an AI agent to help legal teams draft contracts, assign risk scores and make recommendations for ways to optimize operational impact.
useCases.implementationBlueprint: Legal team initiates contract -> AI agent drafts document -> Risk scores assigned -> Optimization recommendations provided -> Operational impact improved

useCases.businessChallenge: Equifax adopted Google Workspace, launching a strategic change management campaign to ensure a smooth transition across more than 20 countries in one weekend. Workspace's suite of Gemini-powered tools for communication, collaboration, and productivity offered a comprehensive and user-friendly solution that could be easily embraced by Equifax employees at all levels.
useCases.implementationBlueprint: Global transition planned -> Change management campaign launched -> Workspace deployed across 20+ countries -> Employees adopt Gemini tools -> Productivity and collaboration improved

useCases.businessChallenge: Finnit, part of the Google for Startups Cloud AI Accelerator, provides AI automation solutions for corporate finance teams, helping to cut accounting procedures time by 90%, boost accuracy, and unlock unique insights.
useCases.implementationBlueprint: Finance team submits procedures -> AI automates accounting tasks -> Processing time cut by 90% -> Accuracy boosted -> Unique insights unlocked

useCases.businessChallenge: Flashpoint is improving efficiency and productivity across its workforce, using Google Workspace to communicate and collaborate more effectively.
useCases.implementationBlueprint: Teams use Workspace for communication -> Collaboration streamlined -> Efficiency improved -> Productivity increased -> Workforce effectiveness enhanced

useCases.businessChallenge: Fluna, a Brazilian digital services company, has automated the analysis and drafting of legal agreements using Vertex AI, Document AI, and Gemini 1.5 Pro, achieving an accuracy of 92% in data extraction while ensuring security and reliability for sensitive information.
useCases.implementationBlueprint: Legal document submitted -> Document AI extracts data with 92% accuracy -> Gemini drafts agreement -> Security ensured for sensitive info -> Legal process automated

useCases.businessChallenge: FreshFields, a global law firm, will roll out Gemini with Google Workspace across its practice and will also create groundbreaking AI products and bespoke AI agents to transform processes in the highly regulated legal industry.
useCases.implementationBlueprint: Gemini deployed across practice -> Bespoke AI agents developed -> Legal processes transformed -> Regulatory compliance maintained -> Innovation in legal industry achieved

useCases.businessChallenge: Joe the Architect, a 25-person architecture firm, catches up on long email chains with Gemini in Gmail to keep track of client needs across dozens of conversations.
useCases.implementationBlueprint: Long email chain received -> Gemini summarizes conversation -> Key client needs extracted -> Team stays informed -> Client communication tracked efficiently

useCases.businessChallenge: KPMG is building Google AI into their newly formed KPMG Law firm, as well as driving AI transformation within the banking industry, and the company is also implementing Agentspace to enhance its own workplace operations.
useCases.implementationBlueprint: AI integrated into KPMG Law -> Banking industry transformation driven -> Agentspace enhances workplace ops -> AI capabilities embedded -> Operations modernized

useCases.businessChallenge: L+R, a design and technology agency, leverages Gemini for Google Workspace to elevate performance and precision, streamlining workflows and empowering its team to achieve more impactful results.
useCases.implementationBlueprint: Team uses Gemini in Workspace -> Workflows streamlined -> Performance elevated -> Precision improved -> More impactful results achieved

useCases.businessChallenge: Monks used Google Gemini to help Hatch build a personalized ad campaign. The campaign delivered an 80% improved click-through rate, 46% more engaged site visitors, and a 31% improved cost-per-purchase over other campaigns. On top of this, by using AI the team was able to deliver the campaign much more efficiently, reducing time to investment by 50% and costs by 97%.
useCases.implementationBlueprint: Campaign requirements defined -> Gemini generates personalized ads -> CTR improved by 80% -> Engagement increased 46% -> Costs reduced by 97%

useCases.businessChallenge: Own Your Brand founder Lauren Magenta uses Google Workspace to run her business and Gemini for Google Workspace is transforming how she manages enrollment. Gemini helps her quickly draft personalized emails to potential clients in her own voice.
useCases.implementationBlueprint: Enrollment process initiated -> Gemini drafts personalized emails -> Founder's voice maintained -> Client communication accelerated -> Business operations streamlined

useCases.businessChallenge: Randstad, a large HR services and talent provider, is using Gemini for Workspace across its organization to transform its work culture, leading to a more culturally diverse and inclusive workplace that's seen a double-digit reduction in sick days.
useCases.implementationBlueprint: Gemini deployed organization-wide -> Work culture transformed -> Diversity and inclusion improved -> Employee wellbeing enhanced -> Sick days reduced by double digits

useCases.businessChallenge: Sulamérica adopted Google Workspace a decade ago to make collaboration among employees more agile, intuitive, and fluid. The insurance company recently started using Gemini in Workspace, making it available to 1,250 employees to increase operational efficiency, security, and productivity.
useCases.implementationBlueprint: Gemini enabled for 1,250 employees -> Collaboration made more agile -> Operational efficiency increased -> Security maintained -> Productivity improved

useCases.businessChallenge: UKG, an HR and workforce management solutions provider, enhances the workplace experience with UKG Bryte AI, a trusted conversational agent built with Google Cloud that enables HR administrators and people managers to request information about company policies, business insights, and more.
useCases.implementationBlueprint: HR admin or manager queries Bryte AI -> Conversational agent processes request -> Company policies retrieved -> Business insights provided -> Workplace experience enhanced

useCases.businessChallenge: Agoda is a digital travel platform that helps travelers see the world for less with its great value deals on a global network of over 4.5M hotels and holiday properties worldwide, plus flights, activities, and more. They're now testing Imagen and Veo on Vertex AI to create visuals, allowing Agoda teams to generate unique images of travel destinations which would then be used to generate videos.
useCases.implementationBlueprint: Travel destination selected -> Imagen generates unique images -> Veo creates videos from images -> Visual content produced -> Marketing assets delivered
